mapper.select: SELECT col.table_name, col.column_name as name, col.ordinal_position as sort, d.description as comment, col.table_schema as schema, col.udt_name as type FROM information_schema.columns col JOIN pg_class c ON c.relname = col.table_name LEFT JOIN pg_description d ON d.objoid = c.oid AND d.objsubid = col.ordinal_position WHERE col.table_name=#{tableName} ORDER BY col.table_name, col.ordinal_position;
